beReported.zh-CN: 您的游戏账号被举报了，请至 {website}/player/{originPersonaId} 查看详情
beReported.en-US: You were reported by someone, see {website}/player/{originPersonaId} for detail

beJudged.zh-CN: 您的案件被裁决为 {status} ，请至 {website}/player/{originPersonaId} 查看详情
beJudged.en-US: Your case was judged as {status}, see {website}/player/{originPersonaId} for detail

beReplied.zh-CN: 您在 {playername} 的案件有新回复，请至 {website}/player/{originPersonaId} 查看详情
beReplied.en-US: You have an reply under {playername}'s thread, see {website}/player/{originPersonaId}

newBanAppeal.zh-CN: {playername} 的案件提交了申诉，请至 {website}/player/{originPersonaId} 查看详情
newBanAppeal.en-US: {playername} has a new ban appeal, see {website}/player/{originPersonaId}

beMuteUser.zh-CN: 你受到管理禁言，请遵循社区发言规则
beMuteUser.en-US: You are under an administrative gag order. Please follow the community speaking rules
